text: Hemalkasa is a village in the Bhamragad taluka of Gadchiroli district in Maharashtra State, India.Integrated Management Information System (IMIS) It belongs to the Madia Gond community. Hemalkasa is where the famous Magsaysay Award-winner couple Dr. Prakash Baba Amte and Dr. Mandakini Amte manage the Lok Biradari Prakalp project. == References == Category:Villages in Gadchiroli district
title: Hemalkasa
